altername_name: Disney's Chicken Little: Ace in Action
Himmel und Huhn: Ace in Action
name: Chicken Little: Ace in Action
overview: Inspired by the "movie within the movie" finale of the film "Chicken Little," Disney's Chicken Little: Ace in Action features Ace, the superhero alter ego of Chicken Little, and the Hollywood versions of his misfit band of friends: Runt, Abby and Fish-Out-of-Water. The crew faces off against Foxy Loxy and her evil Amazonian sidekick, Goosey Loosey, who have an evil plan to take over the Earth.
